name: Citation Network Analysis
tagline: Materials for my talks at PyData Boston 2013 and Law Via the Internet 2013
body:
This page has links to my talk materials and other resources, contact info, and further reading.

My paper on [Citation Analysis of Canadian Case Law](http://canlii.tabillo.com/sh.aspx/file/5d176c63-494d-4e2e-977e-65c59f8cede3).

The [slides](http://canlii.tabillo.com/sh.aspx/file/5d176c63-494d-4e2e-977e-65c59f8cede3) from my presentation at Law via the Internet 2013 in Jersey on Sept. 26, 2013.

An [IPython Notebook with runnable network analysis code](https://www.wakari.io/sharing/bundle/twneale/Citation%20Network%20Analysis).

A demo app that lets you dynamically compare the network data for multiple cases in CanLII's collections: [cite-fight.com](https://cite-fight.com).

### Reading

* [Programming the Semantic Web](http://www.amazon.com/Programming-Semantic-Web-Toby-Segaran/dp/0596153813)
* [Graph Databases](http://graphdatabases.com/)

### Contact

* Twitter: [@twneale](http://twitter.com/twneale)
* Github: [twneale](http://github.com/twneale)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
